home.headline: Discover Your Perfect Job Match
home.description: Upload your resume, let the intelligent agent analyze your strengths, and receive tailored job recommendations backed by AI insights.
home.stepUpload: Upload your resume securely and review the parsed information.
home.stepRecommend: Receive curated job matches ranked by relevance and fit.
home.stepReport: View detailed match reports highlighting strengths and gaps.

upload.instructions: Drag & drop your resume file here, or click to upload
upload.supportedTypes: Supported formats: PDF, DOCX, TXT · Max 10MB

errors.unsupported: Only PDF, DOCX, or TXT files are allowed.
errors.noData: Resume data is unavailable. Please re-upload.

recommend.summaryEmpty: Upload your resume to receive AI-generated recommendations tailored to your profile.
recommend.emptyDescription: We couldn't find matching jobs at the moment. Try adjusting your resume or retry later.
